articles.title: Global smartphone market shrinks 11% in Q1, China badly hit: Report - Business Standard
articles.description: The Chinese market caused nearly half the worldwide decline, mainly due to seasonal weakness, according to market research firm Canalys
articles.content:
Global smartphone shipments reached 311.2 million units in Q1 2022, down 11 per cent (year-on-year), and Chinese vendors were badly hit, according to a new report.
